Class Projects

java.lang.Object
arrays.Projects
public class Projects extends Object
The `Projects` class manages the list of projects in the system. It provides methods to filter, retrieve, add, delete, and manage projects. It is a static utility class that holds all projects and can be accessed for project-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • filter

      public static ArrayList<Project> filter(Manager m)
      Filters and retrieves all projects managed by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      m - The manager whose projects are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of projects managed by the specified manager.

    • getProject

      public static Project getProject(int id) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Retrieves a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The project with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if item is deleted

    • newProject

      public static void newProject(Project project)
      Adds a new project to the project list.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be added.

    • deleteProject

      public static void deleteProject(Project project)
      Deletes a specified project from the project list.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be deleted.

    • getAllProjects

      public static ArrayList<Project> getAllProjects()
      Retrieves all projects in the project list.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects.

    • getSize

      public static int getSize()
      Retrieves the total number of projects (excluding deleted projects).
      Returns:
      The number of active projects.

    • setProjects

      public static void setProjects(ArrayList<Project> p)
      Sets the list of projects and updates the size.
      Parameters:
      p - The new list of projects.
